title: Gizmodo Halloween Costume Show Week 2: Mister Stark, I Feel Extremely Good, Actually
text:
This is the only acceptable iteration of the MCU’s father-son take on Tony Stark and Peter Parker. (Photo: Capt Cash)

Last week, we launched our annual Halloween costume show, and invited you to start sharing your plans for what you’re going to be dressed up as this spooky season. Turns out, being a bunch of lovely nerds, some of you already came alarmingly prepared. We’re here for it.

But even if you’re still working on your own costume, or haven’t even started thinking about it yet, you’ve still got time to share your plans with us.

Every Friday in the run up to the big day itself, we’ll be running check-in posts where you can have the chance to show us your costume or tell us what you’re working on... including the post you’re reading right now!

Still looking for inspiration? We’ve already had some lovely entries this year, like Capt Cash and his son above, who make for an absolutely adorable take on Avengers: Endgame’s Iron Man and Iron Spider. Dwight D. Schrutenhower gave us this great mashup from Halloweens past with this fantastic Strong Bad/Bane crossover:

Meanwhile Crosis101 shared a quartet of costumes, all of which were lovely, but we’re very big fans of his Rebel Alliance pilot suit:

What can we say? We love an X-Wing pilot here.
description: Last week, we launched our annual Halloween costume show, and invited you to start sharing your plans for what you’re going to be dressed up as this spooky season. Turns out, being a bunch of lovely nerds, some of you already came alarmingly prepared. We’re here for it....
